name: SpaceShooter2D (Mahmoud Riad)
description:
GameConcept:

A space themed game where the player is on a journy to prove his strength throughout overcoming various challanges in each level.

GamePlay:

Collect the required keys in level one to proceed to Stage2 (Consist of 3 levels), Survive the Stage2 to proceed to Final Stage (Consist of 3 Levels).
Defeat the Bosses to compelete the game.

Controls:
  • Right => "right Arrow" / "D"
  • Left => "Left Arrow" / "A"
  • Up => "Forward Arrow" / "W"
  • Down=> "Back Arrow" / "S"
  • Aim => "Mouse"
  • Shoot=> "Mouse LeftClick" / "Space"
GameModifications:
  1. Add a new player PowerUps (A shield, A 2nd Gun and Extra life).
  2. Add new Enemies each with different abilites:
  • A-SpaceStation(Protective Walls and armies)
  • B-three Bosses (MassiveHealthBar, Summon Armies and MeteroShowers).
  1. Add Burrning Fuel Visualization using ParticleSys.
  2. Reskined the whole UIElements from the original.
  3. Added New Animations for Certain GameObjects.
  4. NewRespwan System for PowerUps.
  5.  BattleTimerUI.
  6. HiddenItems.
  7. NewBackGrounds.
  8. Added Level's Objectives for each level.
